GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.10.110
GSD.description:
net/x25: Fix null-ptr-deref caused by x25_disconnect

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 5c94b6205e87411dbe9dc1ca088eb36b8837fb47, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 4becb7ee5b3d2829ed7b9261a245a77d5b7de902. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net/x25: Fix null-ptr-deref caused by x25_disconnect
